name: Robux Havoc for Roblox
description:
Try new fun game! Havoc Jump is an addicting hypercasual game where you need to move ball to the bottom section.
The ball constantly jumps - your goal is to evade bad sectors and drop through holes.
Successful streaks trigger berserk mode when you destroy everything the ball lands on.
Many colorful levels will help you pass time with fun. Enjoy!
